mapper.insert: insert into BOOKS (REGNUM, ISBN, BOOKNAME, WRITER, PUBLISHER, BOOKPRICE, REALFILENAME, BOOKINTRODUCTION) values (BOOKS_SEQ.nextval, #{isbn}, #{bookName}, #{writer}, #{publisher}, #{bookPrice}, #{realFileName}, #{bookIntroduction})
mapper.select: select * from BOOKS where WRITER like '%'||'${value}'||'%' or BOOKNAME like '%'||'${value}'||'%' or PUBLISHER like '%'||'${value}'||'%'
